BazaarException - Exception in com.bazaarvoice
An exception type used for problems that arise in the use of the Bazaarvoice SDK.
BazaarException(String) - Constructor for exception com.bazaarvoice.BazaarException
Constructs a new BazaarException with the current stack trace and the specified detail message.
BazaarException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.bazaarvoice.BazaarException
Constructs a new BazaarException with the current stack trace, the specified detail message and the specified cause.
BazaarParams - Class in com.bazaarvoice
The base class for adding parameters to a BazaarRequest.
BazaarParams() - Constructor for class com.bazaarvoice.BazaarParams
 
BazaarRequest - Class in com.bazaarvoice
Sends and handles requests to the Bazaarvoice API.
BazaarRequest(String, String, ApiVersion) - Constructor for class com.bazaarvoice.BazaarRequest
Initialize the request with the necessary parameters.
